name: U.A.T (Ultimate Asteroid Tactical Game)
description:
For a class project we had to make an asteroids clone game. I am planning on updating this over the summer break if I have time. So check back and check it out. I plan on adding audio and sounds effects. I now know how to handle UI elements better so I will be updating that as well. 

Please feel free to leave me any notes or suggestions in the comments below! Thank you!
